benchmark_details.name: ProLiFIC (Procedural Lawmaking Flow in Italian Chambers)
benchmark_details.overview: ProLiFIC is a comprehensive event log dataset of the Italian lawmaking process from 1987 to 2022, created from unstructured data from the Normattiva portal and structured using large language models (LLMs), aimed at supporting process-oriented analyses in legal process mining.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a structured dataset that enhances the understanding and analysis of the Italian lawmaking process.

data.annotation: Automatically generated using large language models

methodology.calculation: Duration is calculated as the difference in days between the first and last recorded events for each law.
methodology.interpretation: Shorter durations indicate efficiency in legislative processes.
methodology.validation: Initial analyses performed to examine legislative output and duration
